sense.def:
Kar je
clear
, zlahka vidimo, slišimo ali razumemo.

seg.quote: The line of its footprints is still clear.
I gave a clear, frank account of the incident.
It was clear from his letter that he was not interested.
Make sure that all your luggage is clearly labelled.
I couldn't see him clearly.
Clearly, it is very important for a solution to be found quickly.

sense.def:
To be clear about something
pomeni nekaj v celoti razumeti.

seg.quote: I'm not clear from what you said whether you support the idea or not.

sense.def:
To have a clear mind or way of thinking
pomeni biti razumen in logičen.

seg.quote: You need clear thought and action.
Wait until you can think more clearly.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka snov
clear
, vidimo skoznjo.

seg.quote: ...a clear glue.
...a small creek with cold, clear water.

sense.def:
Če je neka površina ali prostor
clear
, tam ni ovir ali nezaželenih predmetov.

seg.quote: The road was clear.
...a patch of floor that has been swept clear.

sense.def:
Kadar je dan
clear
, ni megle, dežja ali oblakov.

Kadar je človekova vest
clear
, ne čuti nobene krivde.

Če je en predmet
clear of another
, se drugega predmeta ne dotika.

seg.quote: Raise the jack until the wheel is clear of the ground.

sense.def:
To clear a place
pomeni z nekega kraja odstraniti nezaželene stvari.

seg.quote: The children were helping me clear weeds from the pond.
Will you clear the table when you've finished eating?

sense.def:
Če neka žival ali oseba
clears a fence, wall, or hedge
, skoči čez ograjo, zid ali živo mejo, ne da bi se je dotaknila.

Kadar megla
clears
, postopoma izgine.

Kadar je neki postopek
cleared
, ga pooblaščeni ljudje dovolijo.

seg.quote: The proposals haven't been cleared by the local authority yet.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
cleared of a crime or mistake
, je dokazano, da ni kriv zločina ali napake.

seg.quote: I have every confidence that I will be cleared of the crime.

sense.def:
To stay clear
ali
to steer clear of a person or place
pomeni ne hoditi blizu nekemu človeku ali kraju.

To clear one's throat
pomeni rahlo zakašljati, da laže govorimo.

To clear away
pomeni spraviti proč stvari, ki smo jih uporabljali.

seg.quote: Brody began to clear away the soup bowls.

sense.def:
To clear out of a place
pomeni oditi z nekega kraja;

seg.quote: Just clear out and leave me in peace!

sense.def:
To clear out a cupboard or room
pomeni pospraviti omaro ali sobo in zavreči nezaželene predmete.

To clear up
pomeni urediti neki prostor in pospraviti stvari.

seg.quote: Go and clear up your room.

sense.def:
Kadar je problem ali nesporazum
cleared up
, je rešen ali razložen.

seg.quote: I trembled until the misunderstanding was cleared up.

sense.def:
Kadar slabo vreme
clears up
, preneha deževati ali pa se oblaki razkadijo.
